name: Voyager (itch) (Ben Wright Design)
description:
You wake on a severely damaged ship drifting through space. Do you have what it takes to explore the danger-filled galaxy surrounding you and find a way home?

Controls: (This game can be played entirely with only a keyboard.)

Up Arrow - Thrusters

Left/Right Arrow - Turn Ship

Space - Collect Resources

Enter - Menu Navigation

P/ESC - Pause

To play the game, download and then extract the .zip file and open Voyager.exe to play.

For any help, support or if you just want to give some feedback, please get in touch at www.benwrightdesign.co.uk/contact

Happy Space Exploring!

Special thanks for Jack Ryan for testing!
